source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a coastal nature scenery shot, capturing the energetic interaction of ocean waves with a dark, moss-covered rock. The focus is not on a singular subject but rather on the dynamic and atmospheric display of natural forces, highlighting the raw power and texture of the sea. From an overhead perspective, foamy white water surges and breaks over the irregular, partially submerged rock, contrasting with the surrounding blue-green hues of the turbulent ocean, creating a scene of constant motion.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1.  capturing the energetic interaction of ocean waves with a dark, moss-covered rock.这部分写的太rough了，应该是ocean waves 拍打着 dark, moss-covered 礁石，海水覆盖了一部分的礁石
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The phrase "capturing the energetic interaction of ocean waves with a dark, moss-covered rock" is too vague. It would be more precise to describe it as "ocean waves crashing against the dark, moss-covered rock, with seawater partially covering the rock."
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The phrase "capturing the energetic interaction of ocean waves with a dark, moss-covered rock" is too vague. It would be more precise to describe it as "ocean waves crashing against the dark, moss-covered rock, with seawater partially covering the rock."
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video presents a coastal nature scenery shot, capturing ocean waves crashing against a dark, moss-covered rock, with seawater partially covering the rock. The focus is not on a singular subject but rather on the dynamic and atmospheric display of natural forces, highlighting the raw power and texture of the sea. From an overhead perspective, foamy white water surges and breaks over the irregular, partially submerged rock, contrasting with the surrounding blue-green hues of the turbulent ocean, creating a scene of constant motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a coastal nature scenery shot, capturing ocean waves crashing against a dark, moss-covered rock, with seawater partially covering the rock. The focus is not on a singular subject but rather on the dynamic and atmospheric display of natural forces, highlighting the raw power and texture of the sea. From an overhead perspective, foamy white water surges and breaks over the irregular, partially submerged rock, contrasting with the surrounding blue-green hues of the turbulent ocean, creating a scene of constant motion.

generated_critique: While the caption correctly identifies the scene as an overhead shot of ocean waves crashing on a rock, it misses several key visual details and includes subjective language. The description of the rock as "dark, moss-covered" is a good start, but in the video, the moss is a vibrant, almost fluorescent green, concentrated in the crevices and contrasting sharply with the wet, black volcanic rock. The caption also fails to mention the clusters of small, grey barnacles encrusting the upper portions of the rock, which are clearly visible as the water recedes. The phrase "raw power" is an interpretation rather than a visual description; a more objective alternative would be to describe how the impact of the waves sends white spray several feet into the air. Furthermore, the caption omits the quality of the light; the video is clearly filmed on a bright, sunny day, causing a brilliant, shimmering reflection on the surface of the blue-green water and making the white foam appear intensely bright. Finally, the sentence explaining the focus of the shot is redundant; a stronger caption would simply describe the constant motion of the foamy white water surging, breaking, and then pulling back, revealing the rock's textured surface before the next wave arrives.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures an overhead view of ocean waves crashing against a vibrant, fluorescent green moss-covered rock, with the moss concentrated in the crevices and contrasting sharply with the wet, black volcanic surface. Clusters of small, grey barnacles encrust the upper portions of the rock, visible as the water recedes. The impact of the waves sends white spray several feet into the air, while the bright, sunny day creates a shimmering reflection on the blue-green water and intensifies the brightness of the white foam. The scene is one of constant motion, as the foamy white water surges, breaks, and pulls back, revealing the rock's textured surface before the next wave arrives.
